Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: Social media users have been speculating about the upcoming May federal budget and some have expressed skepticism towards the government's claims of a tight budget. One user suggested that the recent decision to proceed with nuclear submarines may affect budgetary considerations. Several posts recommended investing funds in communities not fossil fuels and implementing a long-term solution for high power bills and pollution. Another group called for left-leaning independent candidates to run in traditionally safe Australian Labor Party seats. Meanwhile the new NSW government announced a delay in presenting its budget until September while it conducts a "line-by-line" spending review.
